TMimeMess.MessagePart
TMimeMess     

property MessagePart: TMimePart;

Unit
MIMEmess

Description
TMimePart object with decoded MIME message. This object can handle any number of nested TMimePart objects itself. It is used for handle any tree of MIME subparts.


See also:
AddPart, AddPartBinary, AddPartBinaryFromFile, AddPartHTML, AddPartHTMLBinary, AddPartHTMLBinaryFromFile, AddPartHTMLFromFile, AddPartMultipart, AddPartText, AddPartTextFromFile, Clear, DecodeMessage, EncodeMessage
